description:
Lloyd manages to somehow fail the test, sending those who are already aware of his strengths scrambling to figure out what went wrong.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose a Majestic Lion Showed Up to the Petting Section of a Zoo and Dozed Off?
Tatoeba Hyakujuu no Ou ga Doubutsuen no Fureai Corner ni Nekorogaru You na Bachigai Kan
たとえば百獣の王が動物園のふれあいコーナーに寝転がるような場違い感
